about_the_game:
🎃 Welcome to Pumpkin Party: A Spooky Extravaganza! 🎉

Dive into the ultimate Halloween gaming experience with Pumpkin Party, the online and local multiplayer first-person PvP game that brings the thrill of Mario Party-inspired mini-games and original spooky challenges right to your fingertips! Get ready to embark on a ghoulishly delightful journey filled with laughter, camaraderie, and competitive fun.

🌟 Key Features:

👻 Haunted Mini-Games: Experience a variety of heart-pounding challenges that capture the essence of the Halloween season. From the spine-chilling Hay Maze, where you must escape before time runs out, to the ghost-infested Haunted Mansion where evading spirits is the key to victory—every mini-game is a pulse-pounding adventure!

🚽 Toilet Jump: Test your agility and precision as you navigate perilous platforms to avoid a disastrous plunge into the lava below. It's a quirky take on the classic jumping game that will have you on the edge of your seat.

👨‍🍳 Spooky Kitchen: Team up with friends to cook spine-tingling Halloween recipes. Collaborate to create creepy concoctions, but beware, failure to finish in time means everyone loses the game! It's a culinary race against the clock that will keep you on your toes.

🎃 Pumpkin Patch: Channel your inner Fall Guy as you navigate physics-based obstacles to collect pumpkins. Race against time to gather as many as you can and bring them back to the pumpkin cart. It's a chaotic dash for victory in true Pumpkin Party style!

🌌 More Games to Come: The fun never stops! Stay tuned for exciting new mini-games and challenges, ensuring that Pumpkin Party remains your go-to destination for Halloween-inspired gaming thrills.

👫 Perfect for Halloween Gatherings: Whether you're hosting a spooktacular party with friends or looking to make new ones, Pumpkin Party is the ideal addition to your Halloween festivities. Create lasting memories as you laugh, strategize, and compete in a virtual celebration of all things Halloween!

👾 Join the Pumpkin Party Community: Connect with fellow Halloween enthusiasts, share your favorite moments, and stay up-to-date on the latest game updates. The Pumpkin Party community is where the real magic happens!

🎮 Get ready for a hauntingly good time—grab your friends, embrace the Halloween spirit, and let the Pumpkin Party begin! 🎃✨
